discourse_list.title: Devcon 2022 Day Uno, on Drinks w/MakerDAO Delegates

content.content: Devcon VI Bogota With GovAlpha, Growth, Jose of the Ambassador Program, and the Anon We kickoff Devcon Bogota with MakerDAO folks we ran into Day 1, including @Jenn @Mamun @prose11 @Facundo @TheExistence @tobalgarcia and GovAlpha’s @hernandoagf  Not Financial Advice This Content is for entertainment and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the FlipFlopFlap YouTube Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by @prose11  a.k.a, Payton Rose, @TheExistence @Jenn, a.ka. Jennifer Senhaji @tobalgarcia @Facundo @ElProgreso a.k.a, Frank Cruz, Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, @hernandoagf, or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.

content.content: The last thing my colleague mentions when being careful with the regulations in Latin America and much more in Venezuela is completely real, the only way to be able to invest in a country where consumerism is high is to have an agreement or contact with a SUNACRIP regulatory entity or have association with the government of the day, and that image for Maker at a global level could not be beneficial, the only thing I would say is that they had dollars to be lenders so that the government continues injecting it to stop inflation, the economy in Venezuela is really complicated to understand but there will always be opportunities
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
